mapper.select: SELECT R.RENTAL_SEQ, R.BOOK_SEQ, B.BOOK_TITLE AS BOOK_TITLE, R.USER_SEQ, R.RENTAL_DT, R.PREDICT_RETURN_DT, R.RETURN_DT, R.RENTAL_STATUS, R.RENTAL_REG_DT, R.RENTAL_UPDATE_DT FROM RENTAL R JOIN ( SELECT BOOK_SEQ, BOOK_TITLE FROM BOOK ) B ON R.BOOK_SEQ = B.BOOK_SEQ WHERE R.RENTAL_SEQ = #{rentalSeq} AND R.RENTAL_STATUS != '04'

SELECT R.RENTAL_SEQ, R.BOOK_SEQ, B.BOOK_TITLE AS BOOK_TITLE, R.USER_SEQ, R.RENTAL_DT, R.PREDICT_RETURN_DT, R.RETURN_DT, R.RENTAL_STATUS, R.RENTAL_REG_DT, R.RENTAL_UPDATE_DT FROM RENTAL R JOIN ( SELECT BOOK_SEQ, BOOK_TITLE FROM BOOK ) B ON R.BOOK_SEQ = B.BOOK_SEQ WHERE R.BOOK_SEQ = #{bookSeq} AND R.RENTAL_STATUS != '04'
mapper.update: UPDATE RENTAL SET RENTAL_STATUS = #{rentalStatus}, RENTAL_UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE RENTAL_SEQ = #{rentalSeq}
